itemDescription: scientist and author children's books about scientific topics

wikipedia_page.main: Frances Rosemary Balkwill  (born 1952) is an English scientist, Professor of Cancer Biology at Queen Mary University of London, and author of children's books about scientific topics.

response: * Fran Balkwill OBE, scientist and author

Victor Darley-Usmar (born in Worksop, Nottinghamshire, England in 1956) is a free-radical biologist and biochemist, the UAB Endowed Professor in Mitochondrial Medicine and Pathology at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Darley-Usmar also contributed to a book titled Microbes, Bugs & Wonder Drugs (by Fran Balkwill and Mic Rolph, with Victor Darley-Usmar), a science book written for young readers and their families..Review of Microbes, Bugs & Wonder Drugs by J K Candlish (1995), Biochemical Education 23 (4): 221–222, .
